attributes.action: Help to protect young children against violence and armed conflict when fighting in wars, this needs more support.
attributes.additional_details: These children have rights to live in safe conditions which is the reason im supporting this group. We need to empower and protect these children as they are getting shown violence and being brought up to witnessing deaths. These children need a proper, safe environment to live in. Those who support war also need to realise this and the effects.
